description: Deletes custom attributes on a VM
name: vm_custom_attributes_delete

custom_attributes.description:
'Array of custom attributes objects to be set. Each object
 should have the following schema:
 - key: string'

id.description: ID of the VM to retrieve custom attributes on for (ex: 100000123)

password.description: Password for username on the ManageIQ Server

server.description: Hostname or IP address of the ManageIQ Server

username.description: Username to login as on the ManageIQ Server
